pinyin: tong2 xing4 lian4 kong3 ju4 zheng4

sentences.english: I commanded the voice before terror could incapacitate me.
sentences.chinese: 我赶在恐惧击倒我以前对那个声音下令。

sentences.english: Fire insurance may be sold by appealing to fear of loss.
sentences.chinese: 火险可能是通过唤起对损失的恐惧而售出的。

sentences.english: This reduces your confidence, making you more vulnerable to your fears.
sentences.chinese: 它会腐蚀掉你的自信，使你被恐惧打败。

sentences.english: This is the phobia or fear of death as such or any dead objects.
sentences.chinese: 这种恐惧症的源头是对死亡或者尸体的害怕。

sentences.english: The black horse screamed loudly, a cry of fear.
sentences.chinese: 黑骏马大声嘶叫起来，那是一种充满恐惧的叫喊。

sentences.english: It is our light, and not our darkness, that frightens us.
sentences.chinese: 我们对自己的光明面，而非黑暗面，感到恐惧。

sentences.english: The key to following your heart is to learn to deal with fear.
sentences.chinese: 要做到心随所愿，秘诀在于学会克服恐惧。

sentences.english: Whoever flees at the sound of terror will fall into a pit;
sentences.chinese: 躲避恐惧声音的必坠入陷坑。

sentences.english: The reward for facing fear is that you get to be fully alive.
sentences.chinese: 面对恐惧的奖励就是你变得完全的鲜活了。

sentences.english: Abundance One of the most common human fears is scarcity.
sentences.chinese: 知足常乐贫穷是人类最普遍的恐惧之一。

sentences.english: He fluctuated between hopes and fears.
sentences.chinese: 他在希望和恐惧中徘徊。

sentences.english: Fear keeps us from surrendering, but love casts out all fear.
sentences.chinese: 恐惧阻碍我们降服，但爱能除去一切恐惧。

sentences.english: Fear keeps us from surrendering, but love casts out all fear.
sentences.chinese: 恐惧阻碍我们降服，但爱能除去一切恐惧。

sentences.english: Fears seems to have many causes.
sentences.chinese: 恐惧看起来似乎有很多肈因。

sentences.english: Horatio most like: it harrows me with fear and wonder.
sentences.chinese: 霍雷肖最想它耙我的恐惧和怀疑。

sentences.english: Many of those present felt this atavistic fear.
sentences.chinese: 在场的那些人中，很多都感到这种隔代遗传的恐惧。

definition: to despair/to give up all hope/desperate/desperation
